name: explosive_mining
title: Explosive Mining
author: Erythion
description:
Use explosives the way Nobel made it for!
Basic compatibility with Bob's Mining, adds 4 tiers of explosive miners if Bob's Mining is active
Miner stats:
Consumes [1.5|3|5|10] explosives/s, produces [18|45|90|240] ore/s. [7|7|9|9] mining radius. Pollutes about 10% more per ore than electric mining (watch out for the pollution bomb on higher tier miners!). No modules.
